content.prompt: Directions: You will hear a brief conversation between two speakers. The exchange will be spoken twice. You are to select, from the four choices, the reply that the first speaker would be most likely to make to the remark of the second speaker.

choices.label: Lesquelles, madame? Les rouges ou les jaunes?
À emporter ou à consommer sur place?

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
